title: Sikisa • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #210
itunes:title: Sikisa • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #210
itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with very funny comic SIKISA!
description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with very funny comic SIKISA!


A lovely one with Sikisa and Brett, as the two catch up and check in on all things film, life and comedy. Sikisa is - at the time of typing and broadcasting (August 2022) - currently holding it down at the Ediburgh Fringe with her excellent show 'Life Of The Party' (links below), and this will be either a perfect introduction if you don't know her, or accompaniment if you're fortunate enough to have made her acquaintance. Sikisa also provides even more evidence that Barbados might just be the place for all of us. She's not sponsored by the Tourist Board Of Barbados by the way but if they come knocking, Brett surely will accommodate. Enjoy the show!


ONLINE
